scenes.action_text: City of Joy Written by GERALD BRACH & ROLAND JOFFE October 1990 Early Draft FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY CITY OF JOY FADE IN: TITLE SEQUENCE. EXT. BIHAR - DAY (DAWN, SUMMER, MID-1980) Heat that has mass. That rises off the parched earth in shimmering waves. After a moment, we see what appear to be figures coming out of the haze, one by one. A family with their few belongings: HASARI PAL, 33, his wife, ALOK
